title: Drawing, "Spring in the Country, London Underground", 1935
medium: Brush and gouache, photographic collage on paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Three butterflies, in outline only. Title in in salmon and pink across the top: SPRING; below, in brown gouache: IN THE COUNTRY. Photograph, lower right of a view toward woods from the corner of a field.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Spring in the Country, London Underground", 1935.
1935. Brush and gouache, photographic collage on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-513.
